QuestData.Title: Azshara Blues
QuestData.Description: Hey! I'm glad I caught you.$B$BI come on behalf of my master, Kalec. He requires your aid. Find him under the bridge in the slums as soon as you can!
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Kalec in Bilgewater Harbor.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for coming. I apologize for the discretion, but it's extremely important that I not be seen by certain individuals.$B$BI'm in quite a bind and I've taken notice of some of your recent deeds. Hear me out, help me, and I'll see to it that you're rewarded in kind.
